page.title: 14The East Hundred Newspaper
page.content:
The{East Hundred}is a small newspaper which gives information about events and goings on in and around{Callington.}
The East Hundred comes out every month and can be bought in all local newsagents.
The editor is called{Viv Dymond}and she is helped by local photographer {Jill Long.
About 450 copies of the paper are printed each month. The photographs are printed in St.Budeaux, Plymouth and the text is printed locally.
Information and reports are sent by local people and organisations. There are no full time reporters working on the paper.
